description:
The story centers around an elementary school teacher who is so stupid that he cannot even write his own name. He does whatever he likes in his classroom. Plus, by all appearances, he is not human.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Hayato`s 4th grade class returns from spring break to find they have a strange new homeroom teacher. What chaos and hijinks will ensue? Meanwhile, two adventurers embark on an epic quest in a parallel fantasy universe.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: And His Name Is Pascal-Sensei / Perfect Plate
Sono Na wa Pascal-sensei / Perfect Plate
その名もパスカル先生 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート

REGULAR.description:
Today is class 4-1`s physical exam, but someone doesn`t seem very excited? What strange tests await Pascal`s students? Meanwhile, our adventurers learn about being an adult and taking responsibility, and Hayato and Pascal investigate some footage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoufu! 100% Shintai Kensa / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
Terror! 100% Physical Exam / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
恐怖! 100%身体検査 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 1%パスカル

REGULAR.description:
There`s a new transfer student in town, and boy is he a doozy! Will his stuck-up attitude prove too much for Pascal and the rest of class 4-1? Meanwhile, a servant of the dark lord is haunted by demons from his past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: My Name Is Tenkousei / Perfect Plate
My Name Is Transfer Student / Perfect Plate
マイネームイズ転校生 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート

REGULAR.description:
With the return of the legendary delinquent Tachibana Hikaru, Pascal is in for the showdown of his life! Meanwhile, a young entrepreneur discovers the risks of product testing, and Kitano Yuusuke sends a message.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu no Furyou, Tachibana Hikaru / Perfect Plate / Kitano Yuusuke-kun no Angou Kouza
Legendary Delinquent, Tachibana Hikaru / Perfect Plate / Kitano Yuusuke-kun`s Code Lesson
伝説の不良, 立花ひかる / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 北野ゆうすけ君の暗号講座

REGULAR.description:
Pop quizzes are supposed to be surprising, but can class 4-1 handle the surprises Pascal has in store for them? Meanwhile, a weary traveler finds the strength to continue in an unlikely place.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beware of Pop Quizzes! / Perfect Plate
Nukiuchi Test ni Ki o Tsukero! / Perfect Plate
ぬきうちテストに気をつけろ! / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート

REGULAR.description:
Class 4-1 comes to school one day to discover that their teacher Pascal is suffering from a terrible illness: May Sickness! Meanwhile, a wandering hero faces the injustice of those who abuse their power, and Pascal teaches how to correctly speak English.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Also Known as May Sickness / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
Kore ga Uwasa no Gogatsubyou / Perfect Plate / America Oudan Pascalinglish
これがウワサの五月病 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / アメリカ横断パスカリングリッシュ

REGULAR.description:
It`s Steve`s birthday, and everyone`s invited! Except Pascal—who shows up anyway, and with quite the present! Meanwhile, a weary adventurer pays the price for getting what he wants.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: This Is Birthday Party / Perfect Plate
This Is Tanjou Party / Perfect Plate
ディス イズ 誕生パーティー / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート

REGULAR.description:
Have you ever wondered what goes on in the school`s faculty room? The students of 4-1 discover more than they bargained for! Meanwhile, a fallen hero confronts his dark side, and Steve learns the wisdom of the ancients.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Anata no Shiranai Shokuinshitsu / Perfect Plate / Ashita Tsukaeru Hieroglyph Kouza
The Faculty Room You Don`t Get to See / Perfect Plate / A Practical Hieroglyphics Lesson
あなたの知らない職員室 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 明日使えるヒエログリフ講座

REGULAR.description:
A student`s seat in the classroom can change the course of their school life, but class 4-1 finds themselves playing musical chairs with more than just classroom seats. Meanwhile, a ravaged wanderer finds warmth in the wasteland, and Hayato learns about communicating with friends.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Seating Change of Destiny / Perfect Plate / Kitano Yuusuke-kun`s Code Lesson
Unmei o Wakeru Sekigae / Perfect Plate / Kitano Yuusuke-kun no Angou Kouza
運命を分ける席替え / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 北野ゆうすけ君の暗号講座

REGULAR.description:
If you thought your school was a zoo, wait till you see what Pascal-sensei has brought to class today! Meanwhile, a young ruler finds the courage to stand up for himself, and Chika tests her observational skills.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Danger! Keep Out! Zoo Classroom / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
Hairuna Kiken! Doubutsu Kyoushitsu / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
入るなキケン! 動物教室 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 1%パスカル

REGULAR.description:
Students must be prepared for any emergency that might happen at school. But Pascal`s safety drills turn out to be out of this world! Meanwhile, a pretender learns the consequences of his hubris, and Hayato learns from the wisdom of the ancients.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Space Evacuation Drill / Perfect Plate / A Practical Hieroglyphics Lesson
Space Hinankunren / Perfect Plate / Ashita Tsukaeru Hieroglyph Kouza
スペース避難訓練 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 明日使えるヒエログリフ講座

REGULAR.description:
Ever wish you had a handbook for how to raise a child? Pascal learns that it`s not as handy as it seems! Meanwhile, a villain gone astray learns to accept his identity, and Pascal teaches some more "correct" English.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: How to Raise a Pascal Junior / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
Pascal Junior no Sodatekata / Perfect Plate / America Oudan Pascalinglish
パスカルジュニアの育て方 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / アメリカ横断パスカリングリッシュ

REGULAR.description:
Class 4-1 has a new student, but she doesn`t seem to be making any friends! Can the class find any common ground with her? Meanwhile, a peek into the future reveals hunger and loss, and Iwata learns the importance of hair hygiene.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mysterious Transfer Student, Ijuuin Kirari / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
Nazo no Tenkousei, Ijuuin Kirari / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
謎の転校生, 伊集院きらり / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 1%パスカル

REGULAR.description:
Pascal`s taken off early for summer break, but where could he have gone? Can Steve`s super-sleuth hound piece together the clues? Meanwhile, a stranger in a strange land finds society shuns his customs, and Pascal shows you don`t need to be rich to eat like a king.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Follow Him!! Pascal-sensei / Perfect Plate / Yum! Pascal Gourmet
Tsuiseki!! Pascal-sensei / Perfect Plate / Zeppin! Pascal Gourmet
追跡!! パスカル先生 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 絶品! パスカルグルメ

REGULAR.description:
The sun`s out, and the school pool`s open! But class 4-1 soon finds that Pascal`s swimming lessons have them going off the deep end! Meanwhile, a would-be hero learns that false pretenses can`t fool those who matter, and Steve receives the wisdom of the centuries.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 100% Dangerous Pool / Perfect Plate / A Practical Hieroglyphics Lesson
100% Dangerous Pool / Perfect Plate / Ashita Tsukaeru Hieroglyph Kouza
100%デンジャラスプール / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 明日使えるヒエログリフ講座

REGULAR.description:
It`s time for the big school event: nature camp! Pascal`s behaving like a proper teacher for once, but will it last? Meanwhile, the heir to a kingdom finds the light of bravery in the darkness, and Mr. DiCaprio learns how not to be rude in English.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Enjoy! Nature Camp Part One / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
Enjoy! Rinkangakkou Zenpen / Perfect Plate / America Oudan Pascalinglish
エンジョイ! 林間学校 前編 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / アメリカ横断パスカリングリッシュ

REGULAR.description:
Nature camp continues, with class 4-1 now in dire straits! Will they succumb to Pascal`s devious machinations? Meanwhile, a traveler journeys through time and meets a traveler who journeys through time and meets a traveler who journeys through time and meets a traveler who journeys through time and meets a traveler who journeys through time and meets a traveler who journeys through time and...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Enjoy! Nature Camp Part Two / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
Enjoy! Rinkangakkou Kouhen / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
エンジョイ! 林間学校 後編 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 1%パスカル

REGULAR.description:
Did you spend your summer break being productive, or just idling around? Pascal proves that you can even take idling to new heights! Meanwhile, a tenacious challenger learns that attempting the impossible will only lead to ruin, and Kitano Yuusuke senses more than anyone bargained for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Midsummer`s Idle Pascal / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
Manatsu no Himahima Pascal / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
真夏のヒマヒマパスカル / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 1%パスカル

REGULAR.description:
Fireworks festivals are the best part of summer break! The food, the games, the show... but what happens when Pascal`s in the mix? Meanwhile, new money gets a first-class experience, and Kitano Yuusuke sends an invaluable message.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pascal Produce Hanabi Taikai / Perfect Plate / Kitano Yuusuke-kun no Angou Kouza
Pascal-Produced Fireworks Festival / Perfect Plate / Kitano Yuusuke-kun`s Code Lesson
パスカル プロデュース 花火大会 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 北野ゆうすけ君の暗号講座

REGULAR.description:
Looks like summer was draining for Pascal, but will his video diary explain what happened or just raise more questions? Meanwhile, even a land of terrors can become a world of joy, and Pascal reveals the secret to eating fresh fruit out of season.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pascal-sensei no Natsuyasumi / Perfect Plate / Zeppin! Pascal Gourmet
Pascal-sensei`s Summer Vacation / Perfect Plate / Yum! Pascal Gourmet
パスカル先生の夏休み / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 絶品! パスカルグルメ

REGULAR.description:
When school lunch includes an ice cream, it`s a special treat. But things get hairy when there`s one extra left over, and class 4-1 tries to decide who gets it. Meanwhile, a hero is confronted with a nigh insurmountable task on his path to greatness, and Pascal teaches the right way to pronounce potato.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bappatsu! Ice no Ran! / Perfect Plate / America Oudan Pascalinglish
Crisis! The Battle for Ice Cream! / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
勃発! アイスの乱! / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / アメリカ横断パスカリングリッシュ

REGULAR.description:
A good teacher will do anything for his students, and the same goes for Pascal. When Steve is kidnapped, can Super Pascal save the day? Meanwhile, a man from another age discovers modern cuisine, and Pascal starts an American car wash.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adauchi! Super Pascal / Perfect Plate / America Oudan Pascalinglish
Revenge! Super Pascal / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
仇討ち! スーパーパスカル / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / アメリカ横断パスカリングリッシュ

REGULAR.description:
Kitano Yuusuke is just another normal, perfectly human student, but he`s behaving awfully strangely today. As humans do. Probably some human chemical destabilizing his human brain. Meanwhile, a lord of darkness faces his greatest challenge yet, and Pascal serves up some café au lait, sans the café.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kitano Yuusuke no Shinjitsu / Perfect Plate / Zeppin! Pascal Gourmet
The Truth of Kitano Yuusuke / Perfect Plate / Yum! Pascal Gourmet
北野ゆうすけの真実 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 絶品! パスカルグルメ

REGULAR.description:
Pascal`s left the assignments back in his office, so Hayato and the gang go help him retrieve them. No, not the faculty room. The Pascal room... and who knows what waits inside? Meanwhile, a mad scientist does not rip off Dragonball Z, and Chika learns the wisdom of the ancients.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Himitsu no Pascal Shitsu / Perfect Plate / Ashita Tsukaeru Hieroglyph Kouza
The Secret Pascal Room / Perfect Plate / A Practical Hieroglyphics Lesson
秘密のパスカル室 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 明日使えるヒエログリフ講座

REGULAR.description:
It`s school Sports Day, which of course means the arrival of a fearsome, catty alien from outer space! Can Iwata save the Earth from destruction, while avoiding his inevitable Kenny-like fate? Meanwhile, a great hero is reminded of the true strength of youth, and more pointless bilingual puns are presented for your ostensible enjoyment.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attack of the Dark Lord of P.E.!! / Perfect Plate / Pascalinglish Straight Outta America
Taiiku Daimaou Shuurai!!! / Perfect Plate / America Oudan Pascalinglish
体育大魔王 襲来!!! / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / アメリカ横断パスカリングリッシュ

REGULAR.description:
Ever wonder what the 100% in the title means? Probably not, but you`re getting an answer anyway! Find out what happens when the hitherto nonexistent meter above Pascal`s head drops to 0%! Meanwhile, a fierce final showdown is fought against not-Gollum on not-Mount-Doom, and the resident delinquent takes a stab at 1% Pascal.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gyouten! 0% Pascal-sensei / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
Shock! 0% Pascal-sensei / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
仰天! 0%パスカル先生 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 1%パスカル

REGULAR.description:
It`s time for class 4-1 to put their cooking skills to the test in this Home Ec throwdown! Who will create the best egg dish? Wait... what happened to the egg? Meanwhile, a new start reminds us of the importance of using protection, and Kirari gets a taste of high-class living.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Battle for the King of Home Ec!! / Perfect Plate / Yum! Pascal Gourmet
Chouri Jisshuu Ou: Ketteisen!! / Perfect Plate / Zeppin! Pascal Gourmet
調理実習王 決定戦!! / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 絶品! パスカルグルメ

REGULAR.description:
What could be more obnoxious than one Steve? How about two? Steve discovers he`s had a shadowy body double all along, who now wants to be something more! Meanwhile, a sinister conspirator discovers the persuasive power of a turn of phrase, and Pascal composes a verse to help a student in need.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Am Kagemusha / Perfect Plate / Pascal Senryuu
I Am Shadow Warrior / Perfect Plate / Pascal Poetry
アイ アム 影武者 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / パスカル川柳

REGULAR.description:
Kanamori Steve comes to school in rags as the Kanamori Group goes bankrupt.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bankrupt?! The Kanamori Group / Perfect Plate / Pascal Poetry
Botsuraku!? Kanamori Zaibatsu / Perfect Plate / Pascal Senryuu
没落!? 金森財閥 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / パスカル川柳

REGULAR.description:
The kids end up in a parallel dystopian world where chaos reigns. Will they be able to find their way back to their own world?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyuuseishu wa Dare Da!? / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
Who Is the Savior!? / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
救世主は誰だ!? / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 1%パスカル

REGULAR.description:
Today, Pascal-sensei takes the class out to see how a factory operates.
Maybe the choice of the ramen factory was not a coincidence, as Pascal-sensei somehow ends up in the production line...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaishaka Kengaku Hajimemashita / Perfect Plate / Zeppin! Pascal Gourmet
We`re Doing Social Studies Field Trips / Perfect Plate / Yum! Pascal Gourmet
社会科見学はじめました / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 絶品! パスカルグルメ

REGULAR.description:
Pascal-sensei is apparently also a member of a comedy duo, and is so confident that he doesn`t need to practice.
But once on stage, that confidence seems to have turned into something much much less impressive...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Pascal from the Comic Duo! / Perfect Plate / Pascal Poetry
Manzaishi Pascal ya de! / Perfect Plate / Pascal Senryuu
漫才師パスカルやでっ! / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / パスカル川柳

REGULAR.description:
What do you spend your time on when you have a day off?
Well, get ready for this, because Pascal-sensei spends this time being an idol!
In another world, a dangerous riceball makes an appearance.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Idol Activity Pasmin! / Perfect Plate / Pascal Poetry
Idol Katsudou Pasmin! / Perfect Plate / Pascal Senryuu
アイドル活動パスミン! / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / パスカル川柳

REGULAR.description:
Today, Pascal-sensei tells the class how he began his journey as a teacher.
Then why is he talking about synchronized swimming?
Later, the award winners for the best students in 4 categories are announced. 
Who will win the ultimate award?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pascal-sensei Hajimete Jugyou / Perfect Plate / Saiyuushuu Seito: Dai Happyou!
Pascal-sensei`s First Class / Perfect Plate / Announcement of the Absolutely Best Student!
パスカル先生初めての授業 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 最優秀生徒 大発表!

REGULAR.description:
The thing that Pascal-sensei unveiled to the students of Kinoeda Grade School today was not a surprise test, 
but something else entirely: a surprise tag battle.
Will the students be able to best their opponents against all the odds and make it through the preliminaries?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ki no Eda Shou: Choujou Kessen - Zenpen / Perfect Plate
Kinoeda Grade School Decisive Battle at the Top Part One / Perfect Plate
きのえだ小 頂上決戦 前編 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート

REGULAR.description:
The final matches of the tournament for the top of the school are on!
Who are the mysterious fighters behind the mask? And where did the third masked fighter come from?
Who will prevail and take the crown?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ki no Eda Shou: Choujou Kessen - Kouhen / Perfect Plate
Kinoeda Grade School Decisive Battle at the Top Part Two / Perfect Plate
きのえだ小 頂上決戦 後編 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート

100%帕斯卡老师
